content.question: Which of the following best describes a feature of the poem’s overall structure?

choices.label: Repeated words reflect the speaker’s inability to escape the past.
Dashes reveal the speaker’s hesitation about the future.
Deliberate patterns of rhyme and meter reinforce the speaker’s self-assuredness.
Shorter lines within stanzas indicate the speaker’s incomplete thoughts.

content.answer: Deliberate patterns of rhyme and meter reinforce the speaker’s self-assuredness.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
